shri lanka krikat aayathanaya sanwidhana kala deshiya siwudina thunkon krikat tharagawaliye palamu tharagayen inimaka ha lakunu 108ka wishishta jayak himikara ganimata anjalo mathiwsge nayakathwayen yuth shri lanka krikat sabhapathige pila samathwiya.sabhapathige pile pandu yawannange wishishta pandu yawima hamuwe palamu inima lakunu 299kata simawu sanwardhana kandayama eeye dinayedi dewani inimata lakunu 168kata simawiya.pi.sawarawanamuththu pitiye pawathi tharagaye eeye siwuwani dinaye di ek kadullak athathiwa palamu inimata lakunu 299k labasiti sanwardhana kandayamata yawu palamu oowarayen ma awasan kadullada ahimi wuye kisidu lakunak labaganimata peraya.

meken hondatama kalabala wechcha amma thiranaya kala meka nam mawa bhayanaka wiparyasayakata lakwime lakunu thama kiyala.ithin wahama kriyathmakawi mawa amma danna handunana nari ha prasawa waidya shrikanthan langata ekka giya.eya thamayi ammage garbhashaya iwath karana sathkama kale.onna ithin ....api denna eyage upades paridi soyisa eke klinik yanna set una.ape ammage waradda thama ispirithalekata sambandhayak thiyena kawuru hambunath koyiweleda thamange putha dosthara (ee kale nam waidya shishya.)kenekda kiyala kiyanne...kiyala balan inna eka.welawakata oya manthare harigiyath welawakata ooka karakila apitama wadinawa.kapal tanal sindrom ekata karana chuti opareshan eken passe mulu athama hiri watenna gaththeth,endaskopiyak ganna giya amma hat atak ekak hadagena gedara aaweth 'andunumkamata,wadi hondata,labeta' nawalokaye sita ragamata maru una nisayi.ithin me parath dosthara kiwwa mita passe mage klinik ekata enna.test okkoma karaganna puluwan kiyala.onna ithin kawuntara waladi mage nama saha wayasa ahana hatith,mage pilithuru nisa owungen labena prathichara hinda mata athiwi thibu manasika thathwayath watahaganna puluwan matayi,awurudu dasayedi babek hadan othanata giya kellektayi witharayi.anthime anka aran api gihin indagaththa,watema babala hambawenna inna ammala.wenadata aasa unath eda nam oya bola badawal dakkama aasawak danune na.koma hari onna giya apata labuna dosthara mahathmaya langata.'amma indaganna..'dosthara kiwwa.ithin ape ammath haribari gahila putuwen wadi una.'na.na..oya ammatayi wadiwenna kiwwe..'dosthara mahathmaya ma diha balala karunika hinawak pawa.ee para nam mata wadiya rathu une amma.'na doktar..me...
